review:
i received a faulty product from amazon.. mic of the phone was not working
after few days..

TL;DR: Is it worth it? If you do not mind spending more than 60k on a phone
with (positives first) an awesome camera, and stellar developer support, but
(now the negatives) dubious screen quality, almost zero after-sales service,
and no headphone jack, this is it.  
  
=== The full review follows ===  
  
If there are a few questions that need to be answered, among the top would be,
what Google is thinking while making the phones. Google phones, if google
decides them to be, can be kings of the Android hill, but every single time,
Google misses out on one thing or the other. And this time, it is the screen,
and the removal of the headphone jack! It added waterproofing, improved on an
already awesome camera, and went back on the headphone jack.  
  
*** My Biggest Grouse ***  
The sound quality is supposedly awesome, but over the regular one thousand
rupee bluetooth headsets, it was worse than it could have been. Using the
dongle, the audio quality is stellar, but for someone like me who keeps using
public transport, and prefers pulling out the phone and shoving things into it
blind, pairing a bluetooth headset blind is simply not my thing.  
  
*** My Next Biggest Grouse ***  
Battery life. Why can Google not include a proper 4000Mah battery? With all
the wireless stuff going on, the battery lasts a day - but barely. Coming from
something like the Motorola Z play, you cannot but be underwhelmed by
generally decent but relatively sub-par battery life.  
  
** My Biggest Concern **  
What if my screen cracks? What if my screen develops issues, like it seems to
be? I am not sure my problems will be resolved quickly. It is not as if I go
to a store and get it replaced. I am not in the US! This would be my biggest
reason to stay away. Awesome photos or not.

Weird feature of capturing mirror images of Selfies.  
On top of it, it doesnt even have any provision to undo mirror effect in
camera setting.  
  
I bought this phone only for its camera and i am so sad that i am returning it
due to the above annoying feature.

Although, I had ordered for a black one, what I rec'd. is a black and white
one. I wanted to return but my wife said let's keep it, as it was for her.  
  
While she is ok using it, I am totally disappointed.

Google pixel 2 XL better than iPhone Apple 10

Phone is awesome and no doubt its the best phone of 2017 but its too
costly.And moreover there is no service for Google products in India.2 years
back I had bought Nexus 6.After warranty period,my phone got switched off.As
it was manufactured by Motorola, I had been to its service centre in Banglore.
They said it will be around 40000/ for getting it repaired. Please don't waste
your money on this cheap quality products from Google.Sorry Google you lost my
trust.

review:
Best phone you can buy right now in the Android ecosystem and better than the
Samsung Galaxy S9. Got it from Amazon.com as the price was on the higher side
during the launch of this phone in India and I am loving this phone! The
camera on this phone does wonders and it easily beats the long line of best
sold camera smart phones such as the Lumia 1020, HTC M8, LG G5. The timely
security updates and patches are so good and it always makes the phone buttery
smooth. The battery life on this phone is best as Google does what it is
supposed to do by optimizing the apps and keeping the battery life steady. I
am using the panda version and the design is amazing as compared to the black
version. The power button on the panda version is a beauty to watch. The
portrait modes on the front as well as the rear camera are a standout feature
too.

Note:- I'm writing this Review after using and testing this , blazingly fast
Google Pixel 2 XL for one week. Instead of writing , a very big review and
irritate u , i just mentioned the major Pros and Cons of Pixel 2 XL in this
Review. Though it is not going to be a complete review , my list will
certainly help you take a decision , because it covers all the important
aspects of the Google Pixel 2 XL smartphone. I Hope my review will be helpful.  
  
●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●  
  
📦📦📦📦📦📦📦📦📦📦

SIM Tool,  
➽3.5 mm to USB-C Earbud Adapter.  
  
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟  
Specifications of google pixel 2 XL  
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟  
  
Resolution➡️2880 x 1440 pixels pOLED  
  
Pixel density➡️538 ppi

Fingerprint sensor➡️Back cover

Colors: Just Black, Black and White.  
  
Google's first Pixel smartphonesweren't just smartphones; they were a
proclamation that Google was more than just a software giant. They were proof
that it could craft first-class devices that showed off what Android was
really capable of. The new Pixel 2 and 2 XL continue that new tradition and
offer some major changes to the Pixel formula. They're also among the first
devices to highlight what's new and notable in Android 8.0 Oreo. While they
don't get absolutely everything right, Google's new phones have still managed
to further the Pixel's reputation for Android excellence.  
  
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟  
Below are the Pros and Cons of Pixel 2 XL  
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟  
  
✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️  
Pros/Likable/Advantages  
✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️✔️  
  
👍Comes with the Latest Version Android 8.0.0, Oreo.  
  
👍IP67 water-resistant. It's finally water resistant.  
  
👍Feels great to hold , minimal bezel.  
  
👍Google Pixel 2 XL packs with Aluminum unibody with hybrid coating, Corning®
Gorilla® Glass 5 for screen protection, and IP67 water and dust resistant.  
  
👍The device packs with Fullscreen 6.0 in (152 mm) display, QHD+ (2880 x 1440)
pOLED at 538ppi. Display protected by 3D Corning® Gorilla® Glass 5. Features:
Always-on display, 100% DCI-P3 coverage, 100000:1 ratio, super contrast, True
black level, Full 24-bits depth or 16.77 million colors.  
  
👍It comes with 12.2MP Rear and 8MP Front Camera with laser autofocus + dual
pixel phase detection. Features: Optical + electronic image stabilization,
f/1.8 aperture (Rear Camera), f/2.4 aperture (Front Camera).  
  
👍It records 4K @ 30fps, 1080p @ 30fps, 60fps, 120fps, 720p @ 30fps, 60fps,
240fps from rear camera and 1080p @ 30fps, 720p @ 30fps, 480p @ 30fps from
front camera.  
  
👍The Google Pixel 2 XL comes with Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 835 by 2.35Ghz +
1.9Ghz, 64Bit Octa-Core for better gaming performance. No lag, No hang.  
  
👍Unlimited Cloud Storage for store photos and videos, No more Memory Card
reqiured.  
  
👍Comes with Fast Charging Support.  
  
❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌  
Cons/Unlikable/Disadvantages  
❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌  
  
👎No Wireless Charging at this price.  
  
👎Google Pixel 2 XL accepts headphone jack adapter (Type-C)  
  
👎Pixel 2 packs with Fingerprint sensor on rear, could interfere with some
uses.  
  
👎The price of device starts from Rs. 71,000.  
  
👎New iPhone 8 and 8 plus records 4K@60fps , Pixel 2 XL Record only 4K@30fps.  
  
👎The display is dim in bright light, which is annoying when shooting photos
outside.  
  
👎Not support memory card.  
  
⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿  
Pixel 2 XL Score in-detail  
⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿⦿  
  
Performance ➽ 9  
  
Camera ➽ 10  
  
Design ➽ 8  
  
Battery life ➽ 8  
  
Value ➽ 7  
  
Software ➽ 9  
  
Calls & sounds ➽ 7  
  
Screen Quality ➽ 6  
  
➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿  
Why to buy and Why not to buy  
➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿➿  
  
It might not be the best Android phone available in every area, but the Google
Pixel 2 XL is the one I would buy. It has a stunning camera, the best version
of Android and i love the texture Google has put over the metal back.  
  
The Samsung Galaxy S8 and LG V30 both have more features and the OnePlus 5 is
a lot cheaper, but the Google Pixel 2 XL shines when you actually use it. Take
a picture with it and you’ll forgive the lack of a headphone jack, or the odd
front bezel.  
  
A stunning camera of Google Pixel 2 XL makes this the current Android
champion.

If the display in your pixel 2 phones are broken. The phone has to replaced by
Google which would cost you a wooping Rs.22000.

Camera is good. Image processing is also good, but slightly high on contrast.
Portrait mode works like a charm. Low light is good for still subjects but if
it's moving you get a motion blur. HDR+ enhanced mode is where you get maximum
dynamic range. It is a bit slow to process, I've missed many moments in HDR+
enhanced mode especially if subject is moving (camera button gets disabled).  
  
Been using it since last two weeks. The screen issue is still there, but it
doesn't bother me at all. Battery backup is very good. Stereo speakers are
great.  
  
Package came with a 3.5mm adapter, USB (not micro usb)- usb c adapter and sim
ejecting tool. So you'll have to get an aftermarket micro usb to usb c adapter
if you have a power bank with micro usb.  
  
Highly recommend a protective case. Ringke transparent case is pretty good if
you like the back design of the phone.

Very nice phone.. and the camera quality is superb

This is one of the best phone that you can buy.  
  
PROS-

8) 3520mAH battery that will last you a whole day.  
9) Corning gorrila glass 5.  
  
CONS-

liking.
